HOME.HISTORY_LEAD: Most relevant projects and experiences in recent years.
HOME.HISTORY_2023_2024_TXT: Between 2023 and 2024, I contributed to the automation of extracting and storing construction price indices. The data was distributed across heterogeneous, unstructured tables, each requiring custom logic. I also normalized fields with line breaks and poorly formatted text, improving overall data quality and consistency. For this work, I used Angular along with .NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
HOME.HISTORY_2025: CNV – Institutional Website and Financial Highway
HOME.HISTORY_2025_TXT: In 2025, I am involved in enhancing the CNV’s institutional website and its Financial Highway platform. For the latter, I apply technologies such as Vue.js, .NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript, collaborating in the development of modern and scalable solutions.
HOME.OBJECTIVES_LEAD: My goal is to create maintainable software that provides real business value. I also strive to grow both professionally and academically, and I enjoy the idea of participating in new projects from scratch and building things.

CV.ABOUT: Full-stack developer with experience in web and software development. Proactive, organized and responsible, able to solve problems creatively, both individually and in a team.

EXP1.B2: ASP.NET Core 8, Web APIs, JSON, MVC, EF Core.

EXP2.B1: ASP.NET Core 8, Web APIs, JSON, MVC, EF Core.
